import React from 'react'; import './Terms.css'; import tnc from '../images/tnc.png'; const termsAndCondition = () => { return (

TERMS AND CONDITIONS

Membership is reoccurring. Recurring billing shall continue until such time as the member cancels the service. You consent to and accept responsibility for all recurring charges to your credit or debit card (or other payment method, as applicable) based on this automatic renewal feature without further authorization from you and without further notice. It is solely the member's responsibility to cancel the service and the payment. You can opt out of auto-renewal at any time in your profile.

 

You may delete your account at any time. Deleting does not trigger reimbursement of, if appropriate, any time remaining on the member's subscription.

 

Members can create an account on the Website for free and try out the Website before deciding whether to pay for the membership. Membership give you an access to all features of the Website, but it does not give you any guarantees of level of the service.

 

The Website never refund members who abuse and do not follow the Terms, the Privacy Policy, any applicable law or regulation and/or commit administrative or criminal violations.

 

3. Use of the Service

You acknowledge that there are risks meeting people online, including without limitation, unknowingly dealing with underage persons or persons acting under a false pretense or for a criminal purpose. You agree to take all necessary precautions when communicating with or meeting with other members, especially if you decide to meet in person. In addition, you agree to review our safety tips prior to using the Website.

We do not investigate reputation of the members, conduct, morality, criminal background, or verify the information such of the members may submit to the Website.

You are solely responsible for your interactions with other members of the Website. We will not be responsible for any damage or harm resulting from your interactions with other members.

 

4. Personal and Non-commercial Use of the Website

The use of the Website is for your personal use, you may not use this Website for a commercial purpose without our prior written permission. Companies, businesses, and/or other entities may not become members and are not entitled to use the Website for any purpose. You may not change, distribute, copy, sell, or use in derivative works any information, content, software, products, or services related to the Website. Collecting member's information and/or email addresses of members by electronic or other means for the purpose of sending unsolicited email and unauthorized framing of or linking to the Website will be investigated, and appropriate legal action may be taken, including without limitation, civil and criminal.

 

5. Submissions to the Website

By submitting content to the Website, you are agreeing to grant us a royalty-free, perpetual, irrevocable, worldwide, non-exclusive right and license to use all content post you post on our Website. We will be entitled to use, reproduce, change, translate, publish, display, distribute or create derivative works from comments, photos, suggestions, or other ideas and content place on our Website.

Read our Privacy Policy to see how we process your personal data.

6. Suspension or Termination of Accounts

We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your account at our sole discretion.

You agree that we may at our sole discretion store for review and delete any content, messages, photos, videos that in our sole judgment violate this Terms or which might be offensive, illegal, or that might violate the rights of, harm, or threaten the safety of other members or any third parties.

 

7. Hyperlinks on the Website

The Website may contain links to other websites that are not owned, operated, maintained, or connected to us. We do not review, investigate or screen the content of these websites. This means we are in no way responsible for the content on linked websites. We make no guarantees or warranties about the content or truthfulness of these links or their websites.

 

8. Website Availability

We will provide you our services with reasonable skill and care.

WE DO NOT WARRANT THAT THE FUNCTIONS OR CONTENT CONTAINED IN THIS WEBSITE WILL BE UNITERRUPTED, FREE FROM DELAYS OR ERROR-FREE, THAT DEFECTS WILL BE CORRECTED, OR THAT THIS WEBSITE OR THE SERVER THAT MAKES IT AVAILABLE WILL BE FREE OF VIRUSES OR OTHER HARMFUL CODE OR WORK IN THE CONFIGURATION OR WITH THE HARDWARE OR SOFTWARE YOU USE.

 

9. Service and password security

To create an account on the Website you must provide us with some of your personal information. Read our Privacy Policy carefully before registering on the Website.

Your safety is very important to us. Please help us keep you and your information safe.

You are responsible for keeping your password safe. Please do not allow other people to use your account. If you think your information or account has been accessed without your permission, please notify us immediately.

We may use third party companies to process the Websites payments on our behalf. These companies are fully responsible for your personal data filled during payment process privacy. We do not store any of your payment information.

 

10. Disputes between members

We are not responsible for resolving disputes between members of our Website. You are responsible for handling your disputes and your interactions on the Website.

In the event that you have a dispute with other members, you release us and officers, directors, members, employees, agents and our affiliates of from claims, demands and damages (actual and consequential) of every kind and nature, known and unknown, suspected and unsuspected, disclosed and undisclosed, arising out of or in any way connected with such disputes.

 

11. Severability

The Terms, together with the Privacy Policy constitute the entire agreement between you and us concerning the use of the Website. If any provision of this agreement is deemed invalid, the same shall not affect the other provisions or the whole of this agreement. The agreement will remain in full force and effect.

Welcome !!

Hello travelers, welcome to TravelCompanion. We are a website that allows you to connect with people all over the world. The following describes the Terms and Conditions on which TravelCompanion offers you to access the Website. The Website is operated by TravelCompanion.

 

PLEASE READ THIS CAREFULLY! THESE TERMS ARE THE RULES AND GUIDELINES FOR USING THE WEBSITE. YOU WILL BE BOUND BY THESE TERMS, AND OUR PRIVACY POLICY IF YOU BROWSE OR CREATE A PROFILE ON THE WEBSITE.

 

By accessing, browsing or using our Website, you are agreeing to comply with and be bound by the following Terms whether or not you become a member of the Website. Please review these Terms and Privacy Policy carefully before using the Website.

 

IF YOU DO NOT AGREE TO THESE TERMS, DO NOT USE THE WEBSITE OR THE SERVICE. FAILURE TO USE THIS WEBSITE IN ACCORDANCE WITH THE FOLLOWING TERMS OF USE MAY RESULT IN CIVIL AND CRIMINAL PENALTIES.

 

1. Eligibility

You must be at least 18 years to use the Website. By creating an account, you are stating that you are at least 18 years old and that you are not prohibited by law from using the Website. You hereby warrant both that you have full power and authority to enter into this Website Terms on your own behalf.

It is a condition of using this Website that you provide information that is accurate, up to date and completely true. We have the right to suspend or terminate any account if it believes the information used to create that account is not accurate, up to date and completely true.

 

2. Membership and fees

We reserve the right to terminate your access to the Website for any reason or no reason. We may terminate your paid membership (hereinafter also referred to as the "membership") upon sending notice to you at the email address you provide in during registration. If we terminate your membership because you have breached this Terms, you shall not be entitled to the refund of any unused portion of subscription fees.

 

); }; export default termsAndCondition;
